title: 559. How to Work with Solid Fabrics
description:
Solid fabrics in quilts date back to the late 1800s, but also continue to be popular today. And there's now a large variety of colors to choose from. We share tips for working with solid fabrics, including shopping for them, pressing them, machine-quilting them, and more. We also share products we love, tips for visiting quilt shops while traveling, and a trend we're obsessed with.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: https://www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-559-how-to-work-with-solid-fabrics
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
